ARABIC: فَإِلَّمْ يَسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لَكُمْ فَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّمَآ أُنزِلَ بِعِلْمِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَن لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَهَلْ أَنتُم مُّسْلِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If they do not respond to you then know that it has been sent down with Allah's knowledge and that there is no god but Him. So will you not become Muslims?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If they do not answer you, then know it has been revealed with the knowledge of God, and that there is no god but He. (And say:) "Will you now submit?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then if (your deities) do not respond to your call for help then feel assured that this Book was revealed with the knowledge of Allah, and that there is no true god but Him. Will you, then, surrender (to this truth)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If they will not respond to you, know that God has sent it with His knowledge and that He is the only God. Will you then become Muslims?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So O Muslims, if they are unable to reply to this challenge of yours, then know well that it is sent down only with the knowledge of Allah; and that except Him, there is no real God; so will you now accept?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: If then they answer you not, know then that it is sent down with the knowledge of Allah and that there is no god besides Him! Will you then be Muslims
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But if they do not answer you, then know that it is revealed by Allah's knowledge and that there is no god but He; will you then submit?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then, if they do not answer you, know that it has been sent down with God's knowledge, and that there is no god but He. So have you surrendered?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And if they answer not your prayer, then know that it is revealed only in the knowledge of Allah; and that there is no Allah save Him. Will ye then be (of) those who surrender?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But if they do not respond to you, then know that this [Quran] is sent down with God's knowledge and that there is no deity but Him. Will you then surrender yourselves to Him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then if they respond you not, know that it hath been sent down only with the Knowledge of Allah, and that there is no god but he; are ye Muslims then?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But if they do not respond to you, know that it has been sent down by Allah’s knowledge, and that there is no god except Him. Will you, then, submit [to Allah]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If then they (your false gods) answer not your (call), know ye that this revelation is sent down (replete) with the knowledge of Allah, and that there is no god but He! will ye even then submit (to Islam)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: If then they answer you not, know then that the Revelation (this Quran) is sent down with the Knowledge of Allah and that La ilaha illa Huwa: (none has the right to be worshipped but He)! Will you then be Muslims (those who submit to Islam)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But if they do not answer you, know that it has been sent down with the knowledge of Allah, and that there is no god except He. So, have you surrendered (become Muslims)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But if they fail to answer you, know that it was revealed with God’s knowledge, and that there is no god but He. Will you then submit?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And if they do not respond to you - then know that the Qur'an was revealed with the knowledge of Allah and that there is no deity except Him. Then, would you [not] be Muslims?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:14] Then, if they, that is, those on whom you call for assistance, do not answer you, know, this address is to the idolaters, that it has been revealed, enwrapped, only in God’s knowledge, not as an invention of lies against Him, and that (an is softened, in other words [understand it as] annahu) there is no god save Him. Will you then submit?, after this definitive argument; in other words: ‘Submit!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: When they could not respond, Allah said: (And if they answer not your prayer) and if the wrong-doers do not answer you, (then know) disbelievers (that it is revealed) that Gabriel brought down the Qur'an (only in the knowledge of Allah) and with his command; (and that there is no God save Him. Will ye then be (of) those who surrender?) and believe in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an.
